SEARCH
Package org.jarzarr.core

Class EngineContext<A extends Enum<A>>

java.lang.Object
org.jarzarr.core.EngineContext<A>
Type Parameters:
A - enum type representing high-level input actions
public final class EngineContext<A extends Enum<A>> extends Object
Immutable container for engine-owned systems.

This is passed to the user GameApp and to scenes so gameplay code can access core services (window, input, actions, scenes, camera, assets) without global singletons.

The only mutable value stored here is lastDt, which is updated once per engine update tick.

  • Constructor Details

    • EngineContext

      public EngineContext(Window window, InputManager input, ActionMap<A> actions, SceneManager scenes, Camera2D camera, AssetManager assets, Scheduler timers, TweenManager tweens)
      Creates a new engine context. All references are stored as-is and are expected to remain valid for the lifetime of the engine.
      Parameters:
      window - window system
      input - input manager
      actions - action map
      scenes - scene manager
      camera - camera
      assets - asset manager

    • setLastDt

      public void setLastDt(double dt)
      Sets the dt used for the current/most recent engine update tick. Called by the engine once per update() step.
      Parameters:
      dt - delta time in seconds
